signMessageDescription: Please sign a message to verify your ownership of the wallet. This will not incur any cost.
claimUsernameDescription: Usernames with 6 or more characters are free to claim.
usernameValidationRules: Usernames must not be longer than 26 characters and can only contain letters, numbers, _ and -
connectWalletDescription: It looks like your wallet is not connected. Connect your wallet to activate the feed
onboardingConnectDescription: We’ll make sure your on-chain identity comes with you. One name, everywhere you go.
activateTimelineDescription: Enable the timeline so your community can start posting and engaging here.
fillInTheDetailsBelowToCompleteSetup: Fill in the details below to complete setup.
postsFromThisCommunityWillAppearHere: When someone shares something, it’ll show up here.
